title: Computer Freezes
body:
Hello,

I have been launching games, but my computer freezes in loading screen. It freezes my whole computer and i am unable to do anything. I have to restart my whole computer, but by that time the game is remade  and I have a leave. I have been in low priority for 5 min because of this once, and I am now in a 10 min low priority for 5 games. It has not happened as often before, but now it's almost everyday. After I play the first game and restart it's usually fine for the rest of the day. I need help fixing this please. :(

replies.body:
Have you already run the repair tool for LoL?

Also run CHKDSK on the commandline to ensure your drive is not corrupted, if you are on windows, and consider doing a clean reinstall of your graphics driver, with DDU (https://www.wagnardsoft.com/ ) and a fresh installer (from Nvidia, AMD, or Intel website, depending on what you have)

I have run the repair tool, but it didn't fix the problem.

I will try your other recommendations though . Thanks!
